meaningMnemonic: You need to know the <kanji>word</kanji> <kanji>rule</kanji>s of the language you're learning, don't you? Then you need a good <vocabulary>dictionary</vocabulary> that can explain its <vocabulary>lexicon</vocabulary>!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
